node.name: The Will
node.rich_text: 2. Will ka seed: "Desire" se hota hai
• Kisi bhi goal ke liye will tabhi banti hai jab hum uske baare mein: ◇
ki agar hum waha pahunch gaye to kaisa lagega
kyunki: ◇ “Mujhe pata hi nahi kaise waha tak jaaunga” ◇ “Path (rasta) clear nahi hai”
: Rasta ka koi fix plan nahi hota
jab tu pehla kadam uthata hai.
ek soch hai jo future ke result ki imagination se paida hoti hai.” • Dar jab justified hota hai: ◇ Jab jaan khatre mein ho (e.g., accident, fire)
chair pe baitha ho aur coding se darr lag raha ho
hai failure ka ◇ Abhi to tu
Check kar: Kya tera dar valid hai?

• Kya tu already pura content dekh chuka hai? ❌ • Kya tu already master ban gaya hai isme? ❌ • Kya tu is course mein fail ho gaya hai? ❌ Toh phir dar kis baat ka? Jab kuch shuru hi nahi kiya, to fail hone ka dar kyun?
• Kai students jo failure se darte hain,
wo hi sabse pehle give up kar dete hain
jab koi subject tough lagta hai. • Wo kehte hain: “Mujhse nahi ho raha, chhodo.” • Lekin soch: Kya ye give-up karna
Jisse tu bachna chahta tha, tu usi se haar gaya.
6. Tere paas kya hona chahiye? → Ek Clear Goal
nahi hoga, tu: ◇ Easily frustrate hoga ◇ Confuse hoga ◇ Give up karega • Lekin agar tera
: ◇ Har mushkil mein tera dimaag bolega: “Mujhe waha pahuchna hi hai — jo bhi ho jaye.”
